sqlMap.sql: SELECT issue_no, mem_id, comment_content, TO_CHAR(COMMENT_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') COMMENT_REGDATE FROM ISSUE_BOARD_COMMENT
sqlMap.select: SELECT ISSUE_NO, PROFILE_FILE.MEM_ID mem_id, COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(COMMENT_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') COMMENT_REGDATE, COMMENT_SEQ, PROFILE_SEQ, PROFILE_SAVENAME, PROFILE_REALNAME, PROFILE_CONTENTTYPE, PROFILE_SIZE, PROFILE_REGDATE, PROFILE_DOWNHIT FROM ISSUE_BOARD_COMMENT, PROFILE_FILE WHERE (ISSUE_BOARD_COMMENT.MEM_ID = PROFILE_FILE.MEM_ID) AND ISSUE_NO = #issue_no#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ISSUE_BOARD_COMMENT (ISSUE_NO, MEM_ID, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_REGDATE, COMMENT_SEQ) VALUES(#issue_no#, #mem_id#, #comment_content#, SYSDATE, ISSUE_BOARD_COMMENT_SEQ.nextval)
